name: Rosso Corsa
description: Rosso Corsa is a charismatic and intelligent oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box-shaped body and cat-themed buttons, Rosso Corsa stands out from the crowd. Its vibrant red color, resembling the famous Ferrari shade, gives it a touch of elegance and sophistication. Equipped with a snake-themed screen and a pair of trendy shades as an add-on, Rosso Corsa exudes both style and functionality.
